text:
I can't seem to make the following functionality described in the user manual 
work:

"One of the most useful features of the Proxy Server is that you can abstract 
out certain common elements from the recorded samples. By attaching an HTTP 
Request Defaults , with the "domain" property specified (eg 
jakarta.apache.org), to your Simple Controller , you can direct JMeter to: 

Only record samples with matching "domain" fields under this Controller, and 
Remove the "domain" field from the recorded sample. 
You can do the same with the "Path" field."
